label: Spa and Wellness Retreats
description: Market category for search queries related to spa and wellness retreats.
intents: Find a spa or wellness retreat for relaxation and rejuvenation.
Book a spa or wellness retreat for weight loss or detox.
Find a luxury spa or wellness retreat for a special occasion or treat.

subcategories.label: Luxury Spa and Wellness Retreats
subcategories.description: High-end spa and wellness retreats with luxury amenities and services.

subcategories.label: Weight Loss and Detox Retreats
subcategories.description: Spa and wellness retreats focused on weight loss and detoxification.

subcategories.label: Day Spas and Spa Hotels
subcategories.description: Spas and wellness centers located in hotels or as standalone day spas.

subcategories.label: Yoga and Wellness Retreats
subcategories.description: Retreats focused on yoga, meditation, and other wellness practices.

subcategories.label: Affordable Spa and Wellness Retreats
subcategories.description: Spa and wellness retreats that are affordable and budget-friendly.
